name: Piano City - Spring Music Festival Story
name_original: Piano City - Spring Music Festival Story
description:
#1 Music Game in 126 countries!

Nominated as the Best Mobile/Tablet Game and Best Casual Game of 2015 by Game Connection!

The whole Piano City awaits - now everyone can feel like a real rock star! Playing the piano was never so FUN and EASY!
Play classic music and modern hits alike, featuring SIA, OneRepublic, Maroon 5, Imagine Dragons, Cranberries and others. Progress through the map, complete diverse musical quests and show the world who is the real star!
P.S. Or at least make your mom proud! :)

Features:

EASY and truly FUN gameplay - feel like a real piano star!
Play modern hits from SIA, OneRepublic, Maroon 5, Imagine Dragons and others;
Diverse game modes;
Daily musical battles - challenge your friends on a piano duel!
Follow an engaging story to progress through Piano City;
Eclectic musical quests;
Game Center Achievements;
Facebook leaderboards.
